oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A note on self improvement of Poincar\'e-Sobolev inequalities via Garsia-Rodemich spaces
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Milman, Mario
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Functional Analysis
26D10, 31C45, 42B25, 46E35 (Primary)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We use the characterization of weak type inequalities via Garsia-Rodemich conditions to show self improving properties of Poincar\'e-Sobolev inequalities in a very general context.
